description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve issues with Rioch copiers while using the companion app, follow these steps:

1. Ensure you are using the V4 drivers specific to your Rioch copier model.
2. Verify that all settings related to the companion app are correctly configured; this includes any misconfigurations that may affect functionality.

**Details**:
- Using the appropriate V4 drivers can enhance compatibility and performance with the companion app.
- Double-check the settings to ensure they align with best practices for the specific copier model. (LLM Synthesized)
